response.job_title: M.Sc Industrial Engineer - Supply Chain Management | Demand and Supply Planning - Production Planning - Project Management - Data Analysis - AI
response.summary:
As an Industrial Engineer with a Master in Supply Chain Management from Politecnico di Milano and Bachelor from Universidad Nacional de Colombia, I have gained a wide theoretical and practical background in Industrial Engineering topics, being keen on processes analysis (Optimization and Simulation) as well as Data Analysis. I have applied these skills in different industries such as Luxury, Consumer Electronics, and White Goods, working for leading companies with different value propositions and market segments.

In my most recent role as Demand Planner at Samsung Electronics, I have achieved monthly sales targets every time, supported orders fulfillment improving Order Fill Rate and minimized risks of merchandise delivery. I am passionate about Digital Transformation and IT 4.0, and I am eager to learn more and apply my data analysis skills in Logistics and Production processes.

I am passionate about music (Bassist player), farming, art, travelling and sports like football, swimming and volleyball. 

I have a constant desire to be in contact with different people promoting the learning  of new languages and cultures. I am proficient in English, Italian, Spanish and good knowledge of German that I am reinforcing to improve my speaking skills.
response.skills: SAP Signavio, Inventory and Order Management, Finance, Machine Learning, Econometrics, Forecasting, Microsoft Azure, Python, R, SQL, SAP ERP, Microsoft Office, Time Management, Teamwork, Logistics Management, Operations Management, Data Analysis, Project Management, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Project

profile_positions.description:
• Identify market needs of each SKU considering sales orders status, channel’s inventory, market trends and product life cycle PIPO Management to provide an efficient demand plan to Sales Team for each account (Distributors-Retailers, Amazon, Marketing Shop Display) achieving monthly sales targets every time.
• Reporting and analysis of Sell-In/Sell-Out data for mobile phones, tablets and accessories along with the review of the Forecast shape (Total sales target), Aging stock and Shortage of mobile accessories.
• Monitoring weekly sales plan with Order Desk to assure the creation of all customer orders and joint work with the Logistics Planner to minimise risks of merchandise delivery to meet On-Time Delivery.
profile_positions.title: Demand Planner

profile_positions.description:
• Assess the accuracy of Luxury Division products’ forecasting for the Italian market and behaviour through time to avoid over and under-forecasting by means of JDA Manugistics Tool. Daily monitoring of Stock and Orders status with Customer Service to support orders’ fulfillment improving Fill Rate.
• Weekly review of launching and promotion plans baseline forecasting and target gaps to assure market position monitoring Sell-Out data and escalating supply constraints to Top management by underlining risk and brand opportunities.
• Shared S&OP process and coordination with Sales managers to assess the feasibility of fulfilling important orders within an established time frame.
• Management of Giftset campaigns assuring Global stock level allocation for Italy and shipment tracking of non-sellable marketing products.
profile_positions.title: Demand and Supply Planning Intern

profile_positions.description:
• Integrate the management of new critical components of all Cooking Division projects (Ovens and Hobs) to ensure the perfect execution of the factory events with adequate development maturity at suppliers.
• Data collection from different departments (PMO, R&D Cooking and Built-in laboratory, Cost managers, Marketing) being the reference point inside the project team for Component homologation.
• Responsible of defining New Product Introduction process, monitor process performance providing weekly reports on its status and keeping them updated according to any variation (BOM Product changes and update, further process requirement).
profile_positions.title: Platform and Project Management Intern

company.name: Samsung Electronics Italia
company.description: Da sempre Samsung ha applicato un pensiero evoluto, orientato verso la ricerca e lo sviluppo aperto al mondo. Oggi siamo leader nella tecnologia digitale, grazie ad assets e a valori aziendali profondi e condivisi, che ci hanno consentito di crescere in un mercato sempre più competitivo e complesso. Per guidare la convergenza digitale, abbiamo sviluppato un'organizzazione dinamica e strategie coerenti, per rispondere alle richieste di consumatori finali e aziende.
